meta.description:
TLD: EU
Script Identifier: Greek
Script Description: Greek Unicode (Basic and Extended)
Version: 1.0
Effective Date: 10 December 2009
   Registry: EURid vzw/asbl
Contact: Marc Van Wesemael admin@eurid.eu
Address: Woluwelaan 150, 1831 Diegem, Belgium
Telephone: +32-2-4012750
Fax: +32-2-4012751
Website: http://www.eurid.eu/

Relevant Policy Document URL: http://link.eurid.eu/trm-con

This document describes the Greek Internationalized Domain Names (IDN) Character Table to be used by EURid vzw/asbl, the .eu Registry for registration of .eu Internationalized Domain Names in Greek Script.

The hyphen (U+002D), as well as the digits zero to nine (U+0030 .. U+0039), for purposes of .eu Internationalised Domain Name registration are considered to form part of the Greek script.

This table is in compliance with the ICANN Guidelines for the Implementation of Internationalized Domain Names Version 2.2, and is intended for publication in the IANA IDN Character Table Registry.
